sub_title: International EAL Lead with a focus on developing practice and supporting all learners in multilingual environments. Writer, researcher and co-convener of the NALDIC International Schools SIG.
summary: Hello! I am an EAL lead within the international sector and I currently design EAL and multilingualism strategies across four campuses. I have a particular interest in learner experience in immersion environments and work with subject teachers to develop relationships and practice that benefits all students. I regularly write and deliver training sessions for large  staff groups, parent groups and learning communities. I also lead the NALDIC International Schools Special Interest Group and write regularly for the EAL Journal. I plan to further my MEd research into international transition and the emotional experience of teenage English language learners in English medium environments. Contact me to talk all things EAL.
